languages.text: "Мы вскрываем контейнеры и добываем себе еду сами. Пища здесь, по крайней мере, настоящая. Ваши прихвостни, Арбитес, скидывают нам пайки, но их не хватает на весь полк. Нас стало слишком много".

"We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."
languages.original_text: "Мы вскрываем контейнеры и добываем себе еду сами. Пища здесь, по крайней мере, настоящая. Ваши прихвостни, Арбитес, скидывают нам пайки, но их не хватает на весь полк. Нас стало слишком много".

traits.locale_text: "We break the crates open and get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

"We break the crates open and get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

"We break the crates open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

"We break the crates open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

"We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

"We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

languages.text: «Abrimos los contenedores y comemos. Al menos es comida de verdad, porque sus esbirros del Arbites nos lanzan raciones que no bastan para todo el regimiento. Ahora somos demasiados».
languages.original_text: "We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

traits.locale_text: «Abrimos los contenedores y comemos. Al menos es comida de verdad, porque sus esbirros del Arbites nos lanzan raciones que no bastan para todo el regimiento. Ahora somos demasiados».

languages.text: “我们砸开了那些集装箱，找到了食物。至少，我们这里的食物是切实存在的。至于你的仆人，那些法务官，他们也会丢给我们一些口粮，但根本不够所有人吃，我们的人已经太多了。”
languages.original_text: "We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

traits.locale_text: “我们砸开了那些集装箱，找到了食物。至少，我们这里的食物是切实存在的。至于你的仆人，那些法务官，他们也会丢给我们一些口粮，但根本不够所有人吃，我们的人已经太多了。”

languages.text: 「俺たちはコンテナを破り開け、必要なものを手に入れる。少なくとも、ここにある食べ物は本物だ。あんたの子分や裁定局は配給をくれるが、連隊全体にとっては十分じゃない。今では俺たちは増えすぎている」
languages.original_text: "We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちはコンテナを破り開け、必要なものを手に入れる。少なくとも、ここにある食べ物は本物だ。あんたの子分や裁定局は配給をくれるが、連隊全体にとっては十分じゃない。今では俺たちは増えすぎている」

languages.text: « Nous fracturons les conteneurs et nous nous servons nous-mêmes. Au moins, la nourriture que nous avons ici est bien réelle. Vos sbires de l'Arbites nous accordent royalement quelques rations de temps en temps, mais pas assez pour l'ensemble du régiment. Nous sommes trop nombreux, à présent. »
languages.original_text: "We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

traits.locale_text: « Nous fracturons les conteneurs et nous nous servons nous-mêmes. Au moins, la nourriture que nous avons ici est bien réelle. Vos sbires de l'Arbites nous accordent royalement quelques rations de temps en temps, mais pas assez pour l'ensemble du régiment. Nous sommes trop nombreux, à présent. »

languages.text: "Konteynerleri kırıp açıyor, kendi kaynağımızı kendimiz çıkarıyoruz. En azından buradaki yiyecekler gerçek. Köleleriniz olan Yargıcılar bize kumanya atıyor ama onlar tüm alaya yetmiyor. Sayımız artık çok fazla."
languages.original_text: "We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

traits.locale_text: "Konteynerleri kırıp açıyor, kendi kaynağımızı kendimiz çıkarıyoruz. En azından buradaki yiyecekler gerçek. Köleleriniz olan Yargıcılar bize kumanya atıyor ama onlar tüm alaya yetmiyor. Sayımız artık çok fazla."

languages.text: "Wir brechen die Container auf und versorgen uns selbst. Wenigstens unser Essen ist real. Eure Lakaien, die Arbites, geben uns einige Rationen, aber sie reichen nicht für das ganze Regiment. Es gibt mittlerweile zu viele von uns."
languages.original_text: "We break the containers open, and we get our own sustenance. At least the food we have here is real. Your minions, the Arbites, toss us some rations, but they aren't enough for the whole regiment. There are too many of us now."

traits.locale_text: "Wir brechen die Container auf und versorgen uns selbst. Wenigstens unser Essen ist real. Eure Lakaien, die Arbites, geben uns einige Rationen, aber sie reichen nicht für das ganze Regiment. Es gibt mittlerweile zu viele von uns."
